description: Personal projects I've been building throughout my learning journey.

project1.title: EcoTrack
project1.longDescription: EcoTrack is a web platform that allows users to record and monitor everyday sustainable actions, such as recycling, water conservation, and eco-friendly transportation. Developed with React, Vite, and Firebase, the app offers gamification with achievements and visual statistics. Ideal for schools and communities that promote environmental education.

project2.title: LinguaPlay
project2.shortDescription: Educational game for learning languages through play.
project2.longDescription: LinguaPlay is an interactive game built with React and Phaser.js, aimed at children and teenagers learning English and Spanish. The level and challenge system uses voice recognition and playful animations to make learning fun. The project was designed to work offline and be used on school tablets.

project3.title: BudgetBuddy
project3.shortDescription: Personal finance organizer focused on credit cards.
project3.longDescription: BudgetBuddy is a web app that helps users manage credit card expenses by categorizing purchases and alerting about due dates. Built with React, Zustand, and TailwindCSS, the app integrates with spreadsheets and supports PDF export. Ideal for young adults starting to organize their finances.

project4.title: Interactive Portfolio
project4.shortDescription: Portfolio with visual effects and multilingual support.
project4.longDescription: This project is a personal portfolio developed with Vite, React, and i18next, focusing on accessibility and interactivity. It includes a yellow ball that follows the cursor, smooth animations with Framer Motion, and a Scroll Area with organized projects. The site is responsive and SEO-optimized, deployed on Netlify.
